author: MARK SHERMAN and DARLENE SUPERVILLE / AP
title: President Trump Promotes ‘Fire Fauci’ Tweet After Disease Doctor Critiques White House Coronavirus Response
description: Coronavirus social restrictions could have saved lives if started earlier, Dr. Anthony Fauci said, seeming to draw President Trump's ire
content: (WASHINGTON) — Social restrictions aimed at stopping the spread of the coronavirus could have saved lives if they’d been started earlier, and when they’re eased new cases are certain to arise, said the nation’s top infectious disease expert, Dr. Anthony Fauci… [+5613 chars]
